quest.name: Hungry for Knowledge
journal:
Managingway is having trouble managing a rapidly escalating cookbook situation.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with Keepingway in Hoper's Hold.
Deliver the requested items to Managingway.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Forename! Pardon my plumpness, but we need printing materials, and lots of them.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: With the establishment of the cooking station, a growing number of our Ways have developed an interest in cooking, you see, and so Cookingway decided to put together a beginner's cookbook.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Alas, with the number of would-be culinarians increasing at such speed, the cookbooks sold out in the blink of an eye, and with a dearth of the necessary printing materials, we're unable to make any more.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Forename! Pardon my plumpness, but we once again find ourselves with a shortage of printing materials.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Cookingway's cookbook is popular as ever, and without your help, we'll never be able to keep up with demand.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We would be duly grateful if you could speak with Keepingway yonder, and use the ingredients he has at hand to craft the necessary materials.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Here about the printing materials, yes?

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Then without further ado, please use these spare parts to cast a number of matrices for the book's typesetting. Should you run out of parts, the yonder doing supporter has plenty more available.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Then without further ado, please use these lengths of wood to produce the finest quality paper carats can buy. Should you run out of wood, the yonder doing supporter has plenty more available.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Then without further ado, please use these vials filled with perfectly safe chemicals to produce a suitable ink for the book. Should you run out of ingredients, the yonder doing supporter has plenty more available.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: When you've finished, please deliver the items to Managingway. Good luck!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4701
dialogue.text: <beep> Hello there! Do you require additional materials? <boop> Ha, trick question! You already have plenty!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4701
dialogue.text: <beep> Hello there! Do you require additional materials? <boop> Ha, trick question! You already have plenty!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4701
dialogue.text: <beep> Hello there! Do you require additional materials? <boop> Ha, trick question! You already have plenty!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4701
dialogue.text: <bloop> Ah, a request for materials! Okay, coming right up!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4701
dialogue.text: <bloop> Ah, a request for materials! Okay, coming right up!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4701
dialogue.text: <bloop> Ah, a request for materials! Okay, coming right up!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: How fares the procurement of printing materials? We wouldn't want to keep those cooking hopefuls waiting for too long...

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Perfect─we can restart production immediately. Thank you, as always, for rising to the occasion!
